   20: 
   21: -module(trace_bif_SUITE).
   22: 
   23: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   24: 
   25: -export([all/0, suite/0, groups/0,
   26:          init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   27:          init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2,
   28: 	 init_per_testcase/2,end_per_testcase/2]).
   29: 
   30: -export([trace_bif/1, trace_bif_timestamp/1, trace_on_and_off/1,
   31: 	 trace_bif_local/1,
   32: 	 trace_bif_timestamp_local/1, trace_bif_return/1,
   33: 	 trace_info_old_code/1]).
   34: 
   35: -export([bif_process/0]).
   36: 
   37: suite() -> [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]}].
   38: 
   39: all() ->
   40:     trace_sessions:all().
   41: 
   42: groups() ->
   43:     trace_sessions:groups(testcases()).
   44: 
   45: testcases() ->
   46:     [trace_bif, trace_bif_timestamp, trace_on_and_off,
   47:      trace_bif_local, trace_bif_timestamp_local,
   48:      trace_bif_return, trace_info_old_code].
   49: 
   50: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   51:     trace_sessions:init_per_suite(Config).
   52: 
   53: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   54:     trace_sessions:end_per_suite(Config).
   55: 
   56: init_per_group(Group, Config) ->
   57:     trace_sessions:init_per_group(Group, Config).
   58: 
   59: end_per_group(Group, Config) ->
   60:     trace_sessions:end_per_group(Group, Config).
   61: 
   62: 
   63: init_per_testcase(Func, Config) when is_atom(Func), is_list(Config) ->
   64:     Config.
   65: 
   66: end_per_testcase(_Func, Config) ->
   67:     trace_sessions:end_per_testcase(Config).
   68: 
   69: erlang_trace(A,B,C) ->
   70:     trace_sessions:erlang_trace(A,B,C).
   71: 
   72: erlang_trace_pattern(A,B,C) ->
   73:     trace_sessions:erlang_trace_pattern(A,B,C).
   74: 
   75: erlang_trace_info(A,B) ->
   76:     trace_sessions:erlang_trace_info(A,B).
   77: 
   78: 
   79: %% Tests switching tracing on and off.
   80: trace_on_and_off(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   81:     Pid = spawn_link(?MODULE, bif_process, []),
   82:     Self = self(),
   83:     1 = erlang_trace(Pid, true, [call,timestamp]),
   84:     {flags, Flags} = erlang_trace_info(Pid,flags),
   85:     [call,timestamp] = lists:sort(Flags),
   86:     {tracer, Self} = erlang_trace_info(Pid,tracer),
   87:     1 = erlang_trace(Pid, false, [timestamp]),
   88:     {flags,[call]} =  erlang_trace_info(Pid,flags),
   89:     {tracer, Self} = erlang_trace_info(Pid,tracer),
   90:     1 = erlang_trace(Pid, false, [call]),
   91:     {flags,[]} =  erlang_trace_info(Pid,flags),
   92:     {tracer, []} = erlang_trace_info(Pid,tracer),
   93:     unlink(Pid),
   94:     exit(Pid,kill),
   95:     ok.
   96: 
   97: %% Test tracing BIFs.
   98: trace_bif(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   99:     do_trace_bif([]).
  100: 
  101: %% Test tracing BIFs with local flag.
  102: trace_bif_local(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  103:     do_trace_bif([local]).
  104: 
  105: do_trace_bif(Flags) ->
  106:     Pid = spawn_link(?MODULE, bif_process, []),
  107:     1 = erlang_trace(Pid, true, [call]),
  108:     erlang_trace_pattern({erlang,'_','_'}, [], Flags),
  109:     Pid ! {do_bif, time, []},
  110:     receive_trace_msg({trace,Pid,call,{erlang,time, []}}),
  111:     Pid ! {do_bif, statistics, [runtime]},
  112:     receive_trace_msg({trace,Pid,call,
  113:                        {erlang,statistics, [runtime]}}),
  114: 
  115:     Pid ! {do_time_bif},
  116:     receive_trace_msg({trace,Pid,call,
  117:                        {erlang,time, []}}),
  118: 
  119:     Pid ! {do_statistics_bif},
  120:     receive_trace_msg({trace,Pid,call,
  121:                        {erlang,statistics, [runtime]}}),
  122: 
  123:     1 = erlang_trace(Pid, false, [call]),
  124:     erlang_trace_pattern({erlang,'_','_'}, false, Flags),
  125:     unlink(Pid),
  126:     exit(Pid, die),
  127:     ok.
  128: 
  129: %% Test tracing BIFs with timestamps.
  130: trace_bif_timestamp(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  131:     do_trace_bif_timestamp([], timestamp, [timestamp]),
  132:     do_trace_bif_timestamp([], timestamp,
  133:                            [timestamp,
  134:                             monotonic_timestamp,
  135:                             strict_monotonic_timestamp]),
  136:     do_trace_bif_timestamp([], strict_monotonic_timestamp,
  137:                            [strict_monotonic_timestamp]),
  138:     do_trace_bif_timestamp([], strict_monotonic_timestamp,
  139:                            [monotonic_timestamp, strict_monotonic_timestamp]),
  140:     do_trace_bif_timestamp([], monotonic_timestamp, [monotonic_timestamp]).
  141: 
  142: %% Test tracing BIFs with timestamps and local flag.
  143: trace_bif_timestamp_local(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  144:     do_trace_bif_timestamp([local], timestamp, [timestamp]),
  145:     do_trace_bif_timestamp([local], timestamp,
  146:                            [timestamp,
  147:                             monotonic_timestamp,
  148:                             strict_monotonic_timestamp]),
  149:     do_trace_bif_timestamp([local], strict_monotonic_timestamp,
  150:                            [strict_monotonic_timestamp]),
  151:     do_trace_bif_timestamp([local], strict_monotonic_timestamp,
  152:                            [monotonic_timestamp, strict_monotonic_timestamp]),
  153:     do_trace_bif_timestamp([local], monotonic_timestamp, [monotonic_timestamp]).
  154: 
  155: do_trace_bif_timestamp(Flags, TsType, TsFlags) ->
  156:     io:format("Testing with TsType=~p TsFlags=~p~n", [TsType, TsFlags]),
  157:     Pid = spawn_link(?MODULE, bif_process, []),
  158:     1 = erlang_trace(Pid, true, [call]++TsFlags),
  159:     erlang_trace_pattern({erlang,'_','_'}, [], Flags),
  160: 
  161:     Ts0 = make_ts(TsType),
  162:     Pid ! {do_bif, time, []},
  163:     Ts1 = receive_trace_msg_ts({trace_ts,Pid,call,{erlang,time,[]}},
  164:                                Ts0,TsType),
  165: 
  166:     Pid ! {do_bif, statistics, [runtime]},
  167:     Ts2 = receive_trace_msg_ts({trace_ts,Pid,call,
  168:                                 {erlang,statistics, [runtime]}},
  169:                                Ts1, TsType),
  170: 
  171:     Pid ! {do_time_bif},
  172:     Ts3 = receive_trace_msg_ts({trace_ts,Pid,call,
  173:                                 {erlang,time, []}},
  174:                                Ts2, TsType),
  175: 
  176:     Pid ! {do_statistics_bif},
  177:     Ts4 = receive_trace_msg_ts({trace_ts,Pid,call,
  178:                                 {erlang,statistics, [runtime]}},
  179:                                Ts3, TsType),
  180: 
  181:     check_ts(TsType, Ts4, make_ts(TsType)),
  182: 
  183:     %% We should be able to turn off the timestamp.
  184:     1 = erlang_trace(Pid, false, TsFlags),
  185: 
  186:     Pid ! {do_statistics_bif},
  187:     receive_trace_msg({trace,Pid,call,
  188:                        {erlang,statistics, [runtime]}}),
  189: 
  190:     Pid ! {do_bif, statistics, [runtime]},
  191:     receive_trace_msg({trace,Pid,call,
  192:                        {erlang,statistics, [runtime]}}),
  193: 
  194:     1 = erlang_trace(Pid, false, [call]),
  195:     erlang_trace_pattern({erlang,'_','_'}, false, Flags),
  196: 
  197:     unlink(Pid),
  198:     exit(Pid, die),
  199:     ok.
  200: 
  201: %% Test tracing BIF's with return/return_to trace.
  202: trace_bif_return(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  203:     do_trace_bif_return(timestamp, [timestamp]),
  204:     do_trace_bif_return(timestamp,
  205:                         [timestamp,
  206:                          monotonic_timestamp,
  207:                          strict_monotonic_timestamp]),
  208:     do_trace_bif_return(strict_monotonic_timestamp,
  209:                         [strict_monotonic_timestamp]),
  210:     do_trace_bif_return(strict_monotonic_timestamp,
  211:                         [monotonic_timestamp, strict_monotonic_timestamp]),
  212:     do_trace_bif_return(monotonic_timestamp, [monotonic_timestamp]).
  213: 
  214: do_trace_bif_return(TsType, TsFlags) ->
  215:     io:format("Testing with TsType=~p TsFlags=~p~n", [TsType, TsFlags]),
  216:     Pid = spawn_link(?MODULE, bif_process, []),
  217:     1 = erlang_trace(Pid, true, [call,return_to]++TsFlags),
  218:     erlang_trace_pattern({erlang,'_','_'}, [{'_',[],[{return_trace}]}],
  219:                          [local]),
  220: 
  221:     Ts0 = make_ts(TsType),
  222:     Pid ! {do_bif, time, []},
  223:     Ts1 = receive_trace_msg_ts({trace_ts,Pid,call,{erlang,time,[]}},
  224:                                Ts0, TsType),
  225:     Ts2 = receive_trace_msg_ts_return_from({trace_ts,Pid,return_from,
  226:                                             {erlang,time,0}},
  227:                                            Ts1, TsType),
  228:     Ts3 = receive_trace_msg_ts_return_to({trace_ts,Pid,return_to, 
  229:                                           {?MODULE, bif_process,0}},
  230:                                          Ts2, TsType),
  231: 
  232: 
  233:     Pid ! {do_bif, statistics, [runtime]},
  234:     Ts4 = receive_trace_msg_ts({trace_ts,Pid,call,
  235:                                 {erlang,statistics, [runtime]}},
  236:                                Ts3, TsType),
  237:     Ts5 = receive_trace_msg_ts_return_from({trace_ts,Pid,return_from,
  238:                                             {erlang,statistics,1}},
  239:                                            Ts4, TsType),
  240:     Ts6 = receive_trace_msg_ts_return_to({trace_ts,Pid,return_to, 
  241:                                           {?MODULE, bif_process,0}},
  242:                                          Ts5, TsType),
  243: 
  244: 
  245:     Pid ! {do_time_bif},
  246:     Ts7 = receive_trace_msg_ts({trace_ts,Pid,call,
  247:                                 {erlang,time, []}},
  248:                                Ts6, TsType),
  249:     Ts8 = receive_trace_msg_ts_return_from({trace_ts,Pid,return_from,
  250:                                             {erlang,time,0}},
  251:                                            Ts7, TsType),
  252:     Ts9 = receive_trace_msg_ts_return_to({trace_ts,Pid,return_to, 
  253:                                           {?MODULE, bif_process,0}},
  254:                                          Ts8, TsType),
  255: 
  256: 
  257: 
  258:     Pid ! {do_statistics_bif},
  259:     Ts10 = receive_trace_msg_ts({trace_ts,Pid,call,
  260:                                  {erlang,statistics, [runtime]}},
  261:                                 Ts9, TsType),
  262:     Ts11 = receive_trace_msg_ts_return_from({trace_ts,Pid,return_from,
  263:                                              {erlang,statistics,1}},
  264:                                             Ts10, TsType),
  265:     Ts12 = receive_trace_msg_ts_return_to({trace_ts,Pid,return_to, 
  266:                                            {?MODULE, bif_process,0}},
  267:                                           Ts11, TsType),
  268:     check_ts(TsType, Ts12, make_ts(TsType)),
  269:     erlang_trace_pattern({erlang,'_','_'}, false, [local]),
  270:     ok.
  271: 
  272: 
  273: receive_trace_msg(Mess) ->
  274:     receive
  275:         Mess ->
  276:             ok;
  277:         Other ->
  278:             ct:fail("Expected: ~p,~nGot: ~p~n", [Mess, Other])
  279:     after 5000 ->
  280:               ct:fail("Expected: ~p,~nGot: timeout~n", [Mess])
  281:     end.
  282: 
  283: receive_trace_msg_ts({trace_ts, Pid, call, {erlang,F,A}}, PrevTs, TsType) ->
  284:     receive
  285:         {trace_ts, Pid, call, {erlang, F, A}, Ts} = M ->
  286:             io:format("~p (PrevTs: ~p)~n",[M, PrevTs]),
  287:             check_ts(TsType, PrevTs, Ts),
  288:             Ts;
  289:         Other ->
  290:             ct:fail("Expected: {trace, ~p, call, {~p, ~p, ~p}, TimeStamp}},~n"
  291:                     "Got: ~p~n",
  292:                     [Pid, erlang, F, A, Other])
  293:     after 5000 ->
  294:               ct:fail("Got timeout~n", [])
  295:     end.
  296: 
  297: receive_trace_msg_ts_return_from({trace_ts, Pid, return_from, {erlang,F,A}}, PrevTs, TsType) ->
  298:     receive
  299:         {trace_ts, Pid, return_from, {erlang, F, A}, _Value, Ts} = M ->
  300:             io:format("~p (PrevTs: ~p)~n",[M, PrevTs]),
  301:             check_ts(TsType, PrevTs, Ts),
  302:             Ts;
  303:         Other ->
  304:             ct:fail("Expected: {trace_ts, ~p, return_from, {~p, ~p, ~p}, Value, TimeStamp}},~n"
  305:                     "Got: ~p~n", [Pid, erlang, F, A, Other])
  306:     after 5000 ->
  307:               ct:fail("Got timeout~n", [])
  308:     end.
  309: 
  310: receive_trace_msg_ts_return_to({trace_ts, Pid, return_to, {M,F,A}}, PrevTs, TsType) ->
  311:     receive
  312:         {trace_ts, Pid, return_to, {M, F, A}, Ts} = Msg ->
  313:             io:format("~p (PrevTs: ~p)~n",[Msg, PrevTs]),
  314:             check_ts(TsType, PrevTs, Ts),
  315:             Ts;
  316:         Other ->
  317:             ct:fail("Expected: {trace_ts, ~p, return_to, {~p, ~p, ~p}, TimeStamp}},~n"
  318:                     "Got: ~p~n", [Pid, M, F, A, Other])
  319:     after 5000 ->
  320:               ct:fail("Got timeout~n", [])
  321:     end.
  322: 
  323: make_ts(timestamp) ->
  324:     erlang:now();
  325: make_ts(monotonic_timestamp) ->
  326:     erlang:monotonic_time(nanosecond);
  327: make_ts(strict_monotonic_timestamp) ->
  328:     MT = erlang:monotonic_time(nanosecond),
  329:     UMI = erlang:unique_integer([monotonic]),
  330:     {MT, UMI}.
  331: 
  332: check_ts(timestamp, PrevTs, Ts) ->
  333:     {Ms, S, Us} = Ts,
  334:     true = is_integer(Ms),
  335:     true = is_integer(S),
  336:     true = is_integer(Us),
  337:     true = PrevTs < Ts,
  338:     Ts;
  339: check_ts(monotonic_timestamp, PrevTs, Ts) ->
  340:     true = is_integer(Ts),
  341:     true = PrevTs =< Ts,
  342:     Ts;
  343: check_ts(strict_monotonic_timestamp, PrevTs, Ts) ->
  344:     {MT, UMI} = Ts,
  345:     true = is_integer(MT),
  346:     true = is_integer(UMI),
  347:     true = PrevTs < Ts,
  348:     Ts.
  349: 
  350: bif_process() ->
  351:     receive
  352:         {do_bif, Name, Args} ->
  353:             apply(erlang, Name, Args),
  354:             bif_process();
  355:         {do_time_bif} ->
  356:             %% Match the return value to ensure that the time() call
  357:             %% is not optimized away.
  358:             {_,_,_} = time(),
  359:             bif_process();
  360:         {do_statistics_bif} ->
  361:             statistics(runtime),
  362:             bif_process();
  363:         _Stuff ->
  364:             bif_process()
  365:     end.
  366: 
  367: 
  368: 
  369: %% trace_info on deleted module (OTP-5057).
  370: trace_info_old_code(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  371:     MFA = {M,F,0} = {test,foo,0},
  372:     Fname = atom_to_list(M)++".erl",
  373:     AbsForms = 
  374:     [{attribute,a(1),module,M},                % -module(M).
  375:      {attribute,a(2),export,[{F,0}]},          % -export([F/0]).
  376:      {function,a(3),F,0,                       % F() ->
  377:       [{clause,a(4),[],[],[{atom,a(4),F}]}]}], %     F.
  378:     %%
  379:     {ok,M,Mbin} = compile:forms(AbsForms),
  380:     {module,M} = code:load_binary(M, Fname, Mbin),
  381:     true  = erlang:delete_module(M),
  382:     {traced,undefined} = erlang_trace_info(MFA, traced),
  383:     erlang:purge_module(M),
  384:     ok.
  385: 
  386: a(L) ->
  387:     erl_anno:new(L).
